import React, { useState } from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { ShieldCheck, CloudUpload, LockKeyhole, Mail, Phone, Menu, X, DatabaseZap, Fingerprint, FileLock2, ScanSearch, Users, User, Briefcase, ArrowRight, } from "lucide-react"; import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext"; export default function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { isAuthenticated, user } = useAuth(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const handleDashboardNavigation = () => { if (!isAuthenticated) { navigate("/login"); return; } if (user?.role === "ADMIN") { navigate("/admin-dashboard"); } else { navigate("/dashboard"); } }; const scrollToSection = (id) => { const element = document.getElementById(id); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } setIsMenuOpen(false); }; const navLinks = [ { title: "Features", id: "features" }, { title: "How It Works", id: "how-it-works" }, { title: "Security", id: "security" }, { title: "Contact", id: "contact" }, ]; const AuthButtons = () => (
{isAuthenticated ? ( ) : ( <> )}
); return (
{/* HEADER / NAVIGATION */}
{/* Logo */}
scrollToSection("hero")} className="flex items-center gap-2 cursor-pointer" > SecureVault
{/* Desktop Nav Links */}
{navLinks.map((link) => ( ))}
{/* Desktop Auth Buttons */}
{/* Mobile Menu Button */}
{/* Mobile Menu */} {isMenuOpen && ( {navLinks.map((link) => ( ))}
)}
{/* HERO SECTION */}
{/* Background glow */}
Your Digital Fortress SecureVault provides bank-grade encryption for your most important documents. Safe, organized, and accessible anywhere, anytime. {isAuthenticated ? ( ) : ( <> )}
{/* HOW IT WORKS SECTION */}

How It Works

A simple and secure 3-step process to protect your digital life.

1. Upload & Encrypt

Drag and drop any file. We instantly encrypt it on your device before it even reaches our servers.

2. Organize & Find

Sort your documents into secure folders, add custom tags, and find anything in seconds with our powerful search.

3. Access & Control

Retrieve your files from any device. Admins can manage user access and permissions with granular control.

{/* SECURITY FEATURES SECTION */}

Your Security is Our Priority

End-to-End Encryption

Only you and the people you authorize can read your files. Not even we can access them.

Multi-Factor Authentication

Secure your account with more than just a password. Add an extra layer of protection via email or authenticator app.

Audited & Compliant

Our infrastructure is built on world-class, compliant data centers, regularly audited for security.

{/* USE CASES SECTION */}

A Secure Vault for Everyone

For Individuals

Keep your passports, birth certificates, wills, and personal IDs safe from loss or unauthorized access.

For Freelancers

Securely store client contracts, invoices, project files, and tax documents, all in one organized place.

For Admin Teams

Manage sensitive company documents, employee records, and financial reports with robust admin controls.

{/* CONTACT SECTION */}

Get in Touch

Have questions or need support? Our team is here to help. Fill out the form or contact us directly.

support@securevault.com
+1 (555) 123-4567
{/* FOOTER */}
{/* Logo & Copyright */}
SecureVault

Your Digital Fortress for Personal Documents.

{new Date().getFullYear()} SecureVault. All rights reserved.

); }
